sentences.sContent: He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
sentences.sCn: 他老是批评妻子的外表。

sentences.sContent: We are often attracted to somebody first by their physical appearance .
sentences.sCn: 我们经常先被一个人的外貌吸引。

sentences.sContent: Women, in general, tend to be more concerned than men about their personal appearance .
sentences.sCn: 总的来说，女性比男性更注重自己的仪容。

sentences.sContent: She had an outward appearance of calm, but deep down she was really worried.
sentences.sCn: 她表面上很镇静，内心却十分担忧。

sentences.sContent: The metal posts spoiled the appearance of the garden.
sentences.sCn: 金属柱子破坏了花园的外观。

sentences.sContent: A garnish helps to enhance the appearance of any dish.
sentences.sCn: 装饰菜能为任何菜肴增色。

sentences.sContent: She’s the kind of woman who takes pride in her appearance .
sentences.sCn: 她是那种对自己的外貌感到自豪的女人。

sentences.sContent: They work hard at school without giving the appearance of being particularly hard-working.
sentences.sCn: 他们在学校里学习很用功，只是表面上并不显得特别如此。

sentences.sContent: The case had all the appearances of a straightforward murder.
sentences.sCn: 从所有迹象来看，这个案件都像一宗简单的谋杀。

sentences.sContent: The pupils looked angelic – but appearances can be deceptive .
sentences.sCn: 这些学生看上去如天使一般，但外表可能是会骗人的。

sentences.sContent: He was, to all appearances , a respectable, successful businessman.
sentences.sCn: 从各方面看，他都是个体面而成功的商人。

sentences.sContent: ...One of the creatures made a dramatic appearance by moving on to the head of the team leader as he slept...
...Participation in this project helped the girls developed a new attitude towards their appearance of their own homes;they've learned how to work with tools...
...We treat them as objects whose appearance and achievements are something we can be proud of...
